scripts.admin-css: npm run admin-css-vendor && npm run admin-css-src
scripts.admin-js-src: uglifyjs admin/src/js/*.js admin/src/js/lib/*.js admin/src/js/components/*.js admin/src/tpl/templates.js > admin/public/js/app.min.js
scripts.admin-js: npm run admin-js-vendor && npm run admin-js-src
scripts.watch-admin-templates: chokidar 'admin/src/tpl/**/*.jstml' -c 'npm run admin-templates && npm run admin-js' --polling
scripts.watch-admin: npm run watch-admin-css & npm run watch-admin-templates & npm run watch-admin-js
scripts.admin: npm run admin-templates && npm run admin-css && npm run admin-js && npm run watch-admin
scripts.web-css: npm run web-css-vendor && npm run web-css-src
scripts.web-js-src: uglifyjs web/src/js/*.js web/src/js/lib/*.js web/src/js/components/*.js web/src/tpl/templates.js > web/public/js/app.min.js
scripts.web-js: npm run web-js-vendor && npm run web-js-src
scripts.watch-web-templates: chokidar 'web/src/tpl/**/*.jstml' -c 'npm run web-templates && npm run web-js' --polling
scripts.watch-web: npm run watch-web-css & npm run watch-web-templates & npm run watch-web-js
scripts.web: npm run web-templates && npm run web-css && npm run web-js && npm run watch-web
